WebLink.url: {!REQUIRESCRIPT("/soap/ajax/22.0/connection.js")} result = sforce.connection.query("select id,opportunityid from Quote where id = '{!Quote.Id}'") window.top.location.href = "{!URLFOR( $Action.Quote.NewQuote ,null,[clone=1,id=Quote.Id,retURL="/"&Quote.Id],true)}&oppid=" + result.records.OpportunityId
